name: Slide Block Puzzle 3D
description:
Join the world of adventures and solve the puzzles you encounter. Find the correct path to place the puzzle blocks in the right places and in the right rotation. Be careful not to fall off.

Game Features:
- Full 3D World
- Differents Blocks
- Many Puzzles
- 36 Levels
- Moving Platform
- Vanishing Paths

Info: Recommended play on full screen. WebGL version of game don't support all functions. If you like Slide Block Puzzle 3D get it on your phone from Google Play Store
